# R Markdown

This is a simple, "hello world" style post written in R markdown.

Let's test a quick code chunk:

```{r cars}
summary(cars)
fit <- lm(dist ~ speed, data = cars)
fit
```

And try a quick plot:

```{r pie, fig.cap='A fancy pie chart.', tidy=FALSE}
par(mar = c(0, 1, 0, 1))
pie(
  c(280, 60, 20),
  c('Sky', 'Sunny side of pyramid', 'Shady side of pyramid'),
  col = c('#0292D8', '#F7EA39', '#C4B632'),
  init.angle = -50, border = NA
)
```
